More Informationon Welcome to Lansbrook Experience Year-Round Outstanding Course Conditions & the Best Greens in Tampa Bay Nestled among tall Cypress in traditional Florida wetlands, Lansbrook Golf Club has been the long-time favorite of residents and visitors alike, including the likes of Pro athletes Larry Bird, Reggie Jackson and members of the Toronto Blue Jays. Lansbrook’s 18-hole, par-72 Lane Marshall designed course was redesigned by acclaimed golf course architect Ron Garl in 1991. Players remark about the great variety of challenging holes that make up this traditional Florida layout. Bordered by majestic trees, Lansbrook’s championship course has no parallel fairways and water on 16 holes. By offering a fun yet challenging layout, CHAMPION Dwarf Bermudagrass greens, and outstanding course conditions throughout the year. Lansbrook has carved out a niche as one of Tampa Bay’s favorite daily fee golf clubs. In addition to championship golf, Lansbrook offers tour-quality practice facilities and PGA Professional instruction. A fully stocked Golf Shop, great food and drinks in our Bar & Grille, and outstanding service complete the Lansbrook experience. If you are planning a corporate, charity or social golf outing, Lansbrook is one of Tampa Bay’s favorite tournament destinations so reserve your preferred date today. Our championship course, comprehensive outing services, and PGA Professional staff will provide a seamless golf experience for you and your outing participants making it both enjoyable and successful. Learn More Surrounded by Florida’s lush scenery (which includes the occasional alligator), Lansbrook is conveniently located just minutes from all of Tampa’s major attractions in Palm Harbor. Florida golf doesn’t get any better than Lansbrook ~ Come out and play! Click Here for Lansbrook Rules & Regulations To Book a Tee Time, call (727) 784-7333 or Book Online As part of an ongoing Accessibility Initiative, Lansbrook Golf Club is using EZLinks Golf LLC to help identify and prioritize accessibility issues on our website. Watch Club Video Book Your Tee Time Online For tee times over the phone, please call (727) 784-7333 . Special Events & Meetings - Lansbrook Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Twitter Book a Tee Time Lansbrook Golf Club Home Golf Book a Tee Time Course Overview Scorecard Practice Facilities PGA Instruction Golf Shop at Lansbrook Current Golf Rates Outings Tournaments & Outings Dining & Events Pizzeria & Grille at Lansbrook Special Events & Meetings Memberships Player Development Programs Member Statements Contact Contact Us Directions & Hours Special Events & Meetings A Great Clubhouse and Scenic Views Provide the Perfect Backdrop for Your Event From casual celebrations to corporate meetings, community events and receptions, Lansbrook Golf Club is the perfect venue to host your next event. Lansbrook’s friendly and professional staff combined with beautiful surroundings and a casual event space with an inviting outdoor patio which can accommodate events for up to 150 guests make the Lansbrook the perfect choice for your meeting or event. Lansbrook offers affordable packages and personalized breakfast, lunch and dinner menus for any size budget. For information on hosting your next event at Lansbrook, please call (727) 784-7333 . Tournaments & Outings - Lansbrook Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Twitter Book a Tee Time Lansbrook Golf Club Home Golf Book a Tee Time Course Overview Scorecard Practice Facilities PGA Instruction Golf Shop at Lansbrook Current Golf Rates Outings Tournaments & Outings Dining & Events Pizzeria & Grille at Lansbrook Special Events & Meetings Memberships Player Development Programs Member Statements Contact Contact Us Directions & Hours Tournaments & Outings Golf Digest’s “Best Places to Play” Are you looking for a golf club with a great course and friendly service that will make an outstanding location for your next golf outing, and also one that is among the best values in Tampa Bay? You will find all that and more at Lansbrook Golf Club in Palm Harbor. Here are a few reasons why you will be glad you selected Lansbrook Golf Club: Championship Golf – Your golfers will enjoy playing a relaxing round on our championship course, lined with mature trees, filled with Florida wildlife and water on 16 holes. Lansbrook is a place where every player will have a great time. We’re on Golf Digest’s list of “Best Places to Play” and joined 12 PGA Tour venues in re-grassing our greens to CHAMPION Dwarf Bermudagrass ~ the BEST greens! Attention to Detail – At Lansbrook, we love hosting golf events at our course and have a PGA staff that knows what it takes to stage a fun-filled outing that will run smoothly regardless of size. Whether you are planning a corporate, charity, or social golf tournament, our Club takes pride in giving you special attention to meet your golfing needs from 20 to 144 players. Great Food – Lansbrook will provide delicious food and can host an awards banquet in the clubhouse or on the outdoor patio overlooking the course. We will customize a menu for you, ranging from hot dogs and hamburgers, to BBQ pork and chicken, or even a Prime Rib buffet. You can have gourmet or casual food served for buffets, box lunches and continental breakfasts. Outstanding Service – The professional team at Lansbrook will provide outstanding service to your golfers. Among the special touches we can include personalized scorecards and cards on carts, PGA professional scoring, and great golf contests. For Golf Tournament & Outing pricing and information, please contact: Outing Sales – General Manager (727) 784-7333 GM7333@Lansbrook-Golf.com Outing Information Request Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. PGA Instruction - Lansbrook Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Twitter Book a Tee Time Lansbrook Golf Club Home Golf Book a Tee Time Course Overview Scorecard Practice Facilities PGA Instruction Golf Shop at Lansbrook Current Golf Rates Outings Tournaments & Outings Dining & Events Pizzeria & Grille at Lansbrook Special Events & Meetings Memberships Player Development Programs Member Statements Contact Contact Us Directions & Hours PGA Instruction JON JOHNSON, PGA A member of the PGA since 1982, Jon has over 35 years of Golf Instruction which includes both private club and public practice facilites. For 18 years he served as both General Manager and Instructor at The Downs Golf Practice and Facility. He is a past president of the West Central Chapter NFPGA and was the 2013 WCC NFPGA Professional of the Year. Some highlights of his teachings include: The Golf Swing “7 Laws” –  The basic seven laws of motion in the swing. Putting “8 Corrects” – The eight correct “musts” in the putting game. Chipping “Triangle Tracking” –  Lower your score around the green. Private Lessons and Weekly Clinics Available Click Here for details and pricing To register for a clinic or for more information on golf instruction, please contact: Jon Johnson, PGA (813) 610-9029 jejohnson@pga.com Lesson Information Request Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Book a Tee Time - Lansbrook Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Twitter Book a Tee Time Lansbrook Golf Club Home Golf Book a Tee Time Course Overview Scorecard Practice Facilities PGA Instruction Golf Shop at Lansbrook Current Golf Rates Outings Tournaments & Outings Dining & Events Pizzeria & Grille at Lansbrook Special Events & Meetings Memberships Player Development Programs Member Statements Contact Contact Us Directions & Hours Book a Tee Time Thanks for choosing Lansbrook Golf Club for your next round! Please use the buttons below to book your tee time online, or call the Golf Shop at (727) 784-7333 . Public Tee Times CANCELLATIONS: * The Club has a 24-hour cancellation policy. If you wish to cancel or change your tee time, contact the Club 24 hours prior to your day of play to avoid cancellation fees. * If you do not cancel 24 hours prior to your day of play, and you do not show for your tee time, your credit card will be charged the full amount of the reservation for all no-show golfers in your group. Book Your Tee Time Online For tee times over the phone, please call (727) 784-7333 . Directions & Hours - Lansbrook Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Twitter Book a Tee Time Lansbrook Golf Club Home Golf Book a Tee Time Course Overview Scorecard Practice Facilities PGA Instruction Golf Shop at Lansbrook Current Golf Rates Outings Tournaments & Outings Dining & Events Pizzeria & Grille at Lansbrook Special Events & Meetings Memberships Player Development Programs Member Statements Contact Contact Us Directions & Hours Directions & Hours From Tampa-Hillsborough Avenue Hillsborough Avenue, head west (turns into Tampa Road in Pinellas County) through Oldsmar. Stay on Tampa Road, do not take S.R. 580. Take Tampa Road to East Lake Road, make a right (Boot Ranch Shopping Center on corner). Go to fourth traffic light (Village Center Drive on left, Ridgemoor on right). Turn left on Village Center Drive. Lansbrook is about three blocks on right, across from YMCA. From Tampa – S.R. 60 Take S.R. 60 to Courtney Campbell Causeway. Exit on to McMullen Booth Road (heading North). Stay on McMullen Booth, pass Curlew Road, over Tampa Road. At this point, McMullen Booth changes to East Lake Road. Go to third traffic light (Village Center Drive on left, Ridgemoor on right). Turn left on Village Center Drive, Lansbrook Golf Club is located three blocks on the right, across from the YMCA. From Clearwater Highway 19 North to Curlew Road, make a right, go to McMullen Booth Road, turn left. Go over Tampa Road. At this point, McMullen Booth changes to East Lake Road. Turn left on Village Center Drive. Lansbrook Golf Club is located three blocks on the right, across from the YMCA. From St. Petersburg Take Bayside Bridge from Ulmerton Road. The name of the road changes to McMullen Booth when you come over the bridge. Take McMullen Booth Road (heading North). Stay on McMullen Booth, pass Curlew Road, over Tampa Road. At this point, McMullen Booth changes to East Lake Road. Go to third traffic light (Village Center Drive on the left, Ridgemoor on the right). Turn left on Village Center Drive. Lansbrook Golf Club is located three blocks on the right, across from the YMCA. From Tarpon Springs From U.S. 19, turn left (East) on Tarpon Ave. Go three miles to East Lake Road. Take a right on East Lake Road and go 3.3 miles. Go past the first Lansbrook entrance to the second entrance. Take right on Village Center Drive. The club is two-tenths of a mile on the right, across from YMCA. Hours of Operation Golf Shop Monday – Sunday: 6 AM – 7 PM Pizzeria & Grille Monday – Thursday: 10 AM – 7 PM Friday – Saturday: 9 AM – 8 PM Sunday: 9 AM – 7 PM Range Monday – Sunday: 6 AM – 7 PM Beverage Cart Wednesday & Friday: 9 AM – 5 PM Saturday – Sunday: 9 AM – 5 PM Address : 4605 Village Center Drive Palm Harbor, FL 34685 Email : GM7333@Lansbrook-Golf.com Phone : (727) 784-7333 Facebook Twitter Book Your Tee Time Online For tee times over the phone, please call (727) 784-7333 . Current Golf Rates - Lansbrook Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Facebook Twitter Book a Tee Time Lansbrook Golf Club Home Golf Book a Tee Time Course Overview Scorecard Practice Facilities PGA Instruction Golf Shop at Lansbrook Current Golf Rates Outings Tournaments & Outings Dining & Events Pizzeria & Grille at Lansbrook Special Events & Meetings Memberships Player Development Programs Member Statements Contact Contact Us Directions & Hours Current Golf Rates Lansbrook Golf Club Rates – Effective October 1, 2023 Call the Lansbrook Golf Shop for great specials at (727) 784-7333 . More Informationon Welcome to Lansbrook Experience Year-Round Outstanding Course Conditions & the Best Greens in Tampa Bay Nestled among tall Cypress in traditional Florida wetlands, Lansbrook Golf Club has been the long-time favorite of residents and visitors alike, including the likes of Pro athletes Larry Bird, Reggie Jackson and members of the Toronto Blue Jays. Lansbrook’s 18-hole, par-72 Lane Marshall designed course was redesigned by acclaimed golf course architect Ron Garl in 1991. Players remark about the great variety of challenging holes that make up this traditional Florida layout. Bordered by majestic trees, Lansbrook’s championship course has no parallel fairways and water on 16 holes. By offering a fun yet challenging layout, CHAMPION Dwarf Bermudagrass greens, and outstanding course conditions throughout the year. Lansbrook has carved out a niche as one of Tampa Bay’s favorite daily fee golf clubs. In addition to championship golf, Lansbrook offers tour-quality practice facilities and PGA Professional instruction. A fully stocked Golf Shop, great food and drinks in our Bar & Grille, and outstanding service complete the Lansbrook experience. If you are planning a corporate, charity or social golf outing, Lansbrook is one of Tampa Bay’s favorite tournament destinations so reserve your preferred date today. Our championship course, comprehensive outing services, and PGA Professional staff will provide a seamless golf experience for you and your outing participants making it both enjoyable and successful. Learn More Surrounded by Florida’s lush scenery (which includes the occasional alligator), Lansbrook is conveniently located just minutes from all of Tampa’s major attractions in Palm Harbor. Florida golf doesn’t get any better than Lansbrook ~ Come out and play! Lansbrook Golf Club Tee Times - Palm Harbor FL Log In / Sign Up Hot Deals Courses Near Me Destinations Best Courses Rewards Join GolfPass Gift Cards Search Hot Deals Near Me Off Sort Distance Time Price Golfers Holes Facility Type Reset Filters League Available Lansbrook Golf Club 4605 Village Center Dr , Palm Harbor , Florida , 34685-1224 Holes 18 Par 72 Length 6862 yards Slope 131 Rating 73.2 Lansbrook Golf Club offers a great challenge, great conditions and service.  Established in 1975 and located in Tampa's North Pinellas.  Lansbrook's greens are Tifdwarf Bermuda and are in excellent condition.  Lansbrook prides itself on constant improvements.  Recently, the clubhouse was renovated, a new irrigation system was installed and greens #10 and #14 were rebuilt.  Water come into play on many of the holes but do not worry, there are four sets of tees to accommodate players.  There are no parallel holes at Lansbrook and many are nestled within forest areas.  Hole #11 is a replica of the famous 26th at Augusta North Golf Club.  Lansbrook is challenging for the good player and fun to average or beginning golfers.  Friendly courteous staff, a complete practice facility (including driving range), chipping and putting green, bag pickup at your car, are all great reasons to make your next tee time at Lansbrook Golf Club.
